stacks.p1: Fast, responsive pages designed to highlight your service or product clearly and with impact.
stacks.p2: Complete online stores ready to sell: shopping cart, payment, product management, and layouts tailored to your business.
stacks.p3: Custom tools and dynamic interfaces for your business, designed to engage users and provide rich interactions.
stacks.p4: Updates for text, images, prices, sections, and features. Keep your website up-to-date without hassle.

about.title: About me
about.p1: I started out in administration, hospitality, and later my own business. In Portugal, I resumed my passion for technology and, since June 2023, I have been studying programming. I have worked as an IT Supervisor for 2 years and now I aim to steer my career toward software development, combining my management experience with my programming knowledge.
about.p2: Java Backend Dev. (EBAC) | JavaScript Front-end Dev. (EBAC) | Administrative Assistant (Casa da Moeda do Brasil) | GNU/Linux Systems Administration (Udemy) | ITSM - IT Service Management (Udemy)
about.p3: React, TypeScript, Java | Vue, jQuery, Redux | SASS, Bootstrap, Cypress
about.p4: Coffee ‚òï, League of Legends, Coffee ‚òï, Anime, Coffee ‚òï, *One Piece*, Coffee ‚òï.
